content: Hi. I had issues a few times with some minimum version requirement on a crate. Wouldn't it be interesting to add a field to the Cargo.toml file so that crates.io and docs.rs can display this information?
It has been discussed many times. I think the keyword to look for is MSRV (minimum supported rust version)
It already has a PR in fact: https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/8037
I would love to see someone work with the submitter to get that completed.
